mapper.select: SELECT m_no, m_id, m_passwd, m_name, m_tel, m_zip_no, m_address, m_detail_address, m_email, to_char(m_birth_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') m_birth_date, m_img, to_char(m_year, 'yyyy-MM-dd') m_year, m_loan, le_name FROM sl_member, sl_level WHERE m_id = #{mId} AND m_level = le_no
mapper.update: UPDATE sl_member SET m_passwd = #{m_passwd}, m_tel = #{m_tel}, m_email = #{m_email}, m_zip_no = #{m_zip_no}, m_address = #{m_address}, m_detail_address = #{m_detail_address}, m_img = #{m_img} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rn, A.* from ( select m_no,m_name, to_char(m_birth_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_birth_date, m_id, m_tel, to_char(m_year, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_year from sl_member where ${search_option} like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by m_no ) A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from sl_member where ${search_option} like '%' || #{search} || '%'
